#summary Contact

== Issues ==

If you have have a problem or difficulty when installing or using Grafx2, a bug to report, or you want to request a change or new feature : Please [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/entry create a new Issue]. You may want to first search the [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list existing Issues] though, maybe it has already been brought up. In that case, read the thread and don't hesitate to add a reply.

== Mailing list ==

E-mail: [mailto://grafx2@googlegroups.com]

It's a public mailing-list, so be aware that your message and e-mail address will be visible at the [http://groups.google.com/group/grafx2 Grafx2 google group (ext)]

The mailing-list is moderated by default, so you'll need to wait for a moderator to check that your message is not spam to green-light it. If you subscribe to the mailing-list itself, we can then white-list you so all your messages are sent immediately. You can choose to subscribe without receiving any message from the list : Just choose "No e-mail" in your subscription preferences.

To contact the project owners privately (bribe? :-D) see their usernames on the project's main page, and add {{{@gmail.com}}}.

== News ==

Use your favorite News aggregator to receive just the right level of information.
  * [http://groups.google.com/group/grafx2/feed/atom_v1_0_msgs.xml RSS] E-mails of the mailing list
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/grafx2/svnchanges/basic?path=/branches/release/ RSS] Changes in source code for the stable version : When a critical bug is fixed
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/grafx2/svnchanges/basic?path=/trunk/ RSS] Changes in source code for the WIP version
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/grafx2/downloads/basic RSS] Downloads : When a new file is uploaded
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/grafx2/updates/basic RSS] All changes on the googlecode site (Very detailed, this is similar to the _News_ tab in the navigation bar)
